title: The City Italy
description: Language and cultural study in Italy. Course considers the social, political, economic, and religious aspects of civic life that gave rise to the unique civic art, the architecture of public buildings, and the design of the urban environment of such cities as Florence, Venice, or Rome. Course materials fees may be required. Students may not receive credit for both HIEU 124 and HIEU 124GS. Students must apply and be accepted into the Global Seminar Program.
